ANML

GT's Living Foods

Visual DesignUXDevelopment

GT's Living Foods is the Kombucha industry's most recognized name. For over two decades, the company has been hand crafting Kombucha the way nature intended. While preserving the essence of the grassroots brand, we designed and developed a new experience incorporating tranquil beauty and delightful moments that nourish the mind, body, and soul.

A beautiful,
browsable showcase

Since its invention, Kombucha has been regarded as a sacred elixir. In creating this showcase, we wanted to give full respect to the vibrant beauty of the product and give a nod to its eastern roots. GT's striking flavors are the central focus in this easily browsable showcase.

Find the flavor that
speaks to your soul

Whether you're in the mood for something spicy or hearty, GT's has a flavor for everyone. With descriptive menus and visual filters, we helped users find the flavor that perfectly speaks to their inner soul.

Creating moments
of inspiration

The GT's brand is about more than just Kombucha, it's about sharing a lifestyle of love and positivity. We created "moments of inspiration" to help customers engage with the brand and be a part of the GT's tribe.

Sharing over two decades
of gratitude

For over two decades, GT's has dedicated themselves to sharing their Kombucha with those around them. With the endless gratitude for their customers in mind, we created a customizable visual timeline so GT's could share its remarkable story with the very customers that made it all possible.

"ANML designed a beautifully interactive website for us that really embodies our brand ethos and helps us tell a powerful story. They worked tirelessly to get it right, and we're thrilled to be able to share this gift with the world. We highly recommend their services."
GT DaveFounder | GT's Living Foods

Ernie Ball
